Stockholm), Sweden on 29 June 1958. Brazil won the World Cup by defeating 
Sweden, and thus won the trophy for the first time. Sweden took the lead after 
only 4 minutes after an excellent finish by captain ... in injury time and Brazil were 
able to celebrate their first World Cup title.

The 1958 FIFA World Cup, the sixth staging of the World Cup, was hosted by 
Sweden from 8 to 29 June. The tournament was won by Brazil, who beat Sweden 
52 in the final for their first title.
